text: Whispering Enemies is a 1939 American drama film directed by Lewis D. Collins and starring Jack Holt, Dolores Costello and Addison Richards.Darby p.65 ==Cast== * Jack Holt as Stephen Brewster * Dolores Costello as Laura Crandall * Addison Richards as Red Barrett * Joseph Crehan as George Harley * Donald Briggs as Fred Bowman * Paul Everton as Prison Warden * Pert Kelton as Virginia Daniels ==References== ==Bibliography== * Darby, William. Masters of Lens and Light: A Checklist of Major Cinematographers and Their Feature Films. Scarecrow Press, 1991. ==External links== * Category:1939 films Category:1939 drama films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Lewis D. Collins Category:Columbia Pictures films
title: Whispering Enemies
